name: islvec
body: |- wb(wcel(c0, clvec), wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, cdr)))

stmt.origin: elrab2(hs0, c0, clvec, clmod, wcel(c1, cdr), wcel(cfv(csca, cv(hs0)), cdr))
stmt.pretty: elrab2(hs0, c0, clvec, clmod, c1 ∈ DivRing, (Scalar ` hs0)∈ DivRing)

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, clvec), wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, cdr)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wb(wcel(cfv(csca, cv(hs0)), cdr), wcel(c1, cdr)))
-| wceq(clvec, crab(hs0, clmod, wcel(cfv(csca, cv(hs0)), cdr)))
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsc(hs0, clmod)
-| diffsw(hs0, wcel(c1, cdr))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ LVec ↔(c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ DivRing))
⊣ (hs0 = c0 →((Scalar ` hs0)∈ DivRing ↔ c1 ∈ DivRing))
⊣ LVec = { hs0 ∈ LMod |(Scalar ` hs0)∈ DivRing }
⊣ d(hs0, c0)
⊣ d(hs0, LMod)
⊣ d(hs0, c1 ∈ DivRing)
